name: Master Trappers
description:
Master Trapper a game created in my second year at Algonquin College Game Development program. It was a large time crunch with other projects on the side as well! Please forgive the bugs and enjoy!

In Master Trappers to avoid campers whenever the players velocity is 0 the player will take damage this forces a chaotic battle environment. Each match is 6 minutes and Tactical can be switched through using 3 & 4 while Traps use 1 & 2.
